definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to have sth go wrong/to have a problem arise/to give problems

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們問餐廳年輕的維吾爾員工這樣冤冤相報何時能了。

sentences.english: I asked the strange boy, raising my eyebrows in curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 我好奇地揚起眉毛問這個奇怪的年輕人。
哈蒙德夫人問，“爲什麼謝我？”

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以問書記官要一份執行表格。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 順便問一聲，你見到我們的張經理嗎？

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 賣掃帚的人拿回了掃帚，隨後問修面要付多少錢。

sentences.english: So how can we not be concerned about the reserves during the transition period?
sentences.chinese: 過渡時期我們不過問儲備金行嗎？

sentences.english: To ask others about their ages is not polite.
sentences.chinese: 問別人的年齡是不文雅的。

sentences.english: We were all told to say that she was a lodger.
sentences.chinese: 要是別人問起來，我們只能說她是“一個租客”。

sentences.english: “So, did you bring the check?” Hu asks.
I asked myself when I saw your picture.
sentences.chinese: 我看見你的照片後這樣問自己。

sentences.english: “What's in the yellow door next to the green stairwell?” Julia asked.
sentences.chinese: “樓梯間旁邊的黃門裏有什麼？”茱莉亞問。

sentences.english: Battelle asks if Yahoo is talking to Microsoft about any kind of deal.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立問雅虎是否在跟微軟商討某項交易。

sentences.english: "But how came you to our house?" asked one.
sentences.chinese: “但是你怎麼回來到我們的房子？”其中一個問到。

sentences.english: Jack began to buff and puff when asked awkward question.
sentences.chinese: 要是問到棘手的問題，傑克就開始顛三倒四地胡說。

sentences.english: Eventually, Mumbo and his friends decided to ask the child.
sentences.chinese: 最終，馬姆博和他的朋友決定問這個孩子。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to press charges/to file a complaint
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
